phrs.translation: 预先警告, 有言在先, 预知梦, 把话说在前头

sentences.sentence: Perhaps he should forewarn customers with a little sign.
sentences.translation: 或许，他应该事先给客人一点提示。

sentences.sentence: We are missing a golden opportunity to forewarn new parents of the challenges they might face once their baby arrives.
sentences.translation: 我们正错过警告小夫妻一旦孩子降生他们将会面对挑战的绝好机会。

sentences.sentence: But I will forewarn you whom ye shall fear: fear him, which after he hath killed hath power to cast into hell; yea, I say unto you, fear him.
sentences.translation: 我要指示你们当怕的是谁。当怕那杀了以后，又有权柄丢在地狱里的。
